Package io.confluent.ksql.topic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SourceTopicsExtractor
    Helper class that extracts all source topics from a query node.
    SourceTopicsExtractorTest  
    TopicCreateInjector
    An injector which injects the topic name, number of partitions and number of replicas into the topic properties of the supplied statement.
    TopicCreateInjectorTest  
    TopicDeleteInjector
    This Injector will delete the topic associated with a DROP [STREAM/TABLE] X DELETE TOPIC.
    TopicDeleteInjectorTest  
    TopicProperties
    A container for all properties required for creating/validating a kafka topic.
    TopicProperties.Builder
    Constructs a TopicProperties with the following precedence order: The statement itself, if it has a WITH clause The overrides, if present (note that this is a legacy approach) The KsqlConfig property, if present (note that this is a legacy approach) The topic properties from the source that it is reading from.
    TopicPropertiesTest
